about_the_game:
Once you have purchased this DLC, you can access it as follows:

1. Click "Manage my DLC" in the DLC block on the game page in the Steam client.
2. Check the "Install" box next to "Locked in Temptation - Walkthrough"
3. The DLC will be downloaded to your games folder that you set up for Steam. The file is called "Locked_in_Temptation_WT_eng.pdf"

Default path: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Locked in Temptation - Walkthrough"

content_descriptors.notes: This game is intended for adults only. It contains explicit images or depictions of sexual acts and violence. If any of these topics may offend you, we recommend not playing the game. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Once you have purchased this DLC, you can access it as follows:

1. Click "Manage my DLC" in the DLC block on the game page in the Steam client.
2. Check the "Install" box next to "Locked in Temptation - Walkthrough"
3. The DLC will be downloaded to your games folder that you set up for Steam. The file is called "Locked_in_Temptation_WT_eng.pdf"

Default path: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Locked in Temptation - Walkthrough"
name: Locked in Temptation - Walkthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
